title: Rhizobia-legume symbiosis mediates direct and indirect interactions between plants, herbivores and their parasitoids
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Carlos Bustos-Segura, Adrienne L. Godschalx, Lucas Malacari, Fanny Deiss, Sergio Rasmann, Daniel J. Ballhorn, Betty Benrey
